chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
v: nat -> R
u: nat -> R
l: Rbar

Goal:
(forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq v l

Premises:
is_LimInf_seq = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ u n < l0 + eps) /\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> l0 - eps < u n) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> M < u n | m_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ u n < M end : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
is_LimInf_seq_ext_loc : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> is_LimInf_seq u l -> is_LimInf_seq v l
is_inf_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_inf_seq u l -> is_inf_seq v l
is_LimSup_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq v l
is_sup_seq_ext : forall (u v : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> is_sup_seq u l -> is_sup_seq v l
Inf_seq_ext : forall u v : nat -> Rbar, (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> Inf_seq u = Inf_seq v
Sup_seq_ext : forall u v : nat -> Rbar, (forall n : nat, u n = v n) -> Sup_seq u = Sup_seq v
is_LimSup_seq_ext_loc : forall (u v : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), eventually (fun n : nat => u n = v n) -> is_LimSup_seq u l -> is_LimSup_seq v l
is_LimInf_opp_LimSup_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) < -> is_LimSup_seq u l
is_LimSup_opp_LimInf_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq (fun n : nat => - u n) (Rbar_opp l) < -> is_LimInf_seq u l
is_LimInf_supInf_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimInf_seq u l < -> is_sup_seq (fun m : nat => Inf_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l
is_sup_seq_lub : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l
is_inf_seq_glb : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq u l -> Rbar_is_glb (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l
Rbar_is_glb_inf_seq : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_glb (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_inf_seq u l
Rbar_is_lub_sup_seq : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), Rbar_is_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n) l -> is_sup_seq u l
filter_forall : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x) -> ?F P where ?T : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Type] ?F : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [u : nat -> R v : nat -> R l : Rbar |- Filter ?F]
LPO_notforall : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P n \/ ~ P n) -> ~ (forall n : nat, ~ P n) -> exists n : nat, P n
is_LimSup_seq = fun (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall N : nat, exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ l0 - eps < u n) /\ (exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < l0 + eps) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (N : nat), exists n : nat, (N <= n)%nat /\ M < u n | m_infty => forall M : R, exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> u n < M end : (nat -> R) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inf_eq_glb : forall u : nat -> Rbar, Inf_seq u = Rbar_glb (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n)
Rbar_sup_eq_lub : forall u : nat -> Rbar, Sup_seq u = Rbar_lub (fun x : Rbar => exists n : nat, x = u n)
is_sup_seq_major : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) (n : nat), is_sup_seq u l -> Rbar_le (u n) l
is_sup_seq_unique : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq u l -> Sup_seq u = l
is_inf_seq_unique : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_inf_seq u l -> Inf_seq u = l
is_LimSup_infSup_seq : forall (u : nat -> R) (l : Rbar), is_LimSup_seq u l < -> is_inf_seq (fun m : nat => Sup_seq (fun n : nat => u (n + m)%nat)) l
is_sup_opp_inf_seq : forall (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar), is_sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp (u n)) (Rbar_opp l) < -> is_inf_seq u l
is_sup_seq = fun (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + eps)) /\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (l0 - eps) (u n)) | p_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt M (u n) | m_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt (u n) M end : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_inf_seq = fun (u : nat -> Rbar) (l : Rbar) => match l with | Finite l0 => forall eps : posreal, (forall n : nat, Rbar_lt (l0 - eps) (u n)) /\ (exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) (l0 + eps)) | p_infty => forall (M : R) (n : nat), Rbar_lt M (u n) | m_infty => forall M : R, exists n : nat, Rbar_lt (u n) M end : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inf_opp_sup : forall u : nat -> Rbar, Inf_seq u = Rbar_opp (Sup_seq (fun n : nat => Rbar_opp (u n)))
eventually = fun P : nat -> Prop => exists N : nat, forall n : nat, (N <= n)%nat -> P n : (nat -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scope is [function_scope]
Init.Nat.sub = fix sub (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0%nat => n | S k => match m with | 0%nat => n | S l => sub k l end end : nat -> nat -> nat Argument scopes are [nat_scope nat_scope]
ex_inf_seq : forall u : nat -> Rbar, {l : Rbar | is_inf_seq u l}
ex_sup_seq : forall u : nat -> Rbar, {l : Rbar | is_sup_seq u l}
Rbar_is_lub_ext : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_lub E1 l -> Rbar_is_lub E2 l
Rbar_is_glb_ext : forall (E1 E2 : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar), (forall x : Rbar, E1 x <-> E2 x) -> Rbar_is_glb E1 l -> Rbar_is_glb E2 l
Rbar_is_lub = fun (E : Rbar -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => Rbar_is_upper_bound E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, Rbar_is_upper_bound E b -> Rbar_le l b) : (Rbar -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
is_lub_Rbar = fun (E : R -> Prop) (l : Rbar) => is_ub_Rbar E l /\ (forall b : Rbar, is_ub_Rbar E b -> Rbar_le l b) : (R -> Prop) -> Rbar -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
Inf_seq = fun u : nat -> Rbar => proj1_sig (ex_inf_seq u) : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar Argument scope is [function_scope]
Sup_seq = fun u : nat -> Rbar => proj1_sig (ex_sup_seq u) : (nat -> Rbar) -> Rbar Argument scope is [function_scope]
INR_le : forall n m : nat, INR n <= INR m -> (n <= m)%nat
inj_le : forall n m : nat, (n <= m)%nat -> (Z.of_nat n <= Z.of_nat m)%Z
inj_gt : forall n m : nat, (n > m)%nat -> (Z.of_nat n > Z.of_nat m)%Z

```coq
intros Huv Hu.
unfold is_LimInf_seq in *.
unfold is_LimInf_seq.
intros eps.
destruct l.
- intros.
  destruct (Hu eps) as [Hl1 Hl2].
  split.
  + intros N.
    destruct (Hl1 N) as [n [Hle Hlt]].
    exists n.
    split; assumption.
  + destruct (Hl2 eps) as [N HN].
    exists N.
    intros n Hle.
    apply HN in Hle.
    assumption.
- intros.
  destruct (Hu eps) as [N HN].
  exists N.
  intros n Hle.
  apply HN in Hle.
  assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros Huv Hu. unfold is_LimInf_seq in *. unfold is_LimInf_seq. intros eps. destruct l. - intros. destruct (Hu eps) as [Hl1 Hl2]. split. + intros N. destruct (Hl1 N) as [n [Hle Hlt]]. exists n. split; auto. + destruct (Hl2 eps) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hle. apply HN in Hle. auto. - intros. destruct (Hu eps) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hle. apply HN in Hle. auto.
